file_content.text: No, I don't know if or when it will all be over! Now go back to your home, stay inside and stop bothering me!
Are you all right?
It's just so frustrating! I want to get out there and help but instead I'm the quarantine zone's glorified babysitter--and not all that glorified.
I don't think you want to be stuck in rakghoul country. You don't look equipped for it, for one.
It's safer for you here.
So you're a THORN volunteer?
Who are you?
Funny, you don't seem to be tied to a stake.
So go.
Well, obviously, I'd go grab all my blasters first.
Tralie Masoon. Signed up to make a difference. Whee.
Ha ha. Ever heard of a thing called work ethic? I'm not gonna just quit on THORN.
So, look, you're clearly some kind of big deal. You need to go out there and take those rakghouls down for me.
A little tip: there are tunnels out there just crawling with rakghouls. Like, I wouldn't even go. It's their point of origin.
Where do I find that?
Hope I run into you at a cantina when all this is over. I wanna hear every last amazing, gruesome detail!
Guess I missed all the fun.
They said you made it underground. Didn't think I'd see you again.
Like I keep telling everyone, I am not an information kiosk. Try checking the news once in a while.
How am I supposed to live vicariously through you if you're hanging out with me?
Look for THORN's massive drill thing. They call it The Spike. Can't miss it. It'll take you underground.
Hey. Hi. Uh, not that I'm following your every move or anything, but heard you're near The Spike. You're really going down there. Cool.
